fields.health_warning: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) ACCORDING TO THE SURGEON GENERAL, WOMEN SHOULD NOT DRINK ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DURING PREGNANCY BECAUSE OF THE RISK OF BIRTH DEFECTS. (2) CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IMPAIRS YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE A CAR OR OPERATE MACHINERY, AND MAY CAUSE HEALTH PROBLEMS.

fieldDetails.reasoning: Prominent, largest text on the front label reading 'BACKBONE BOURBON'.
Front label directly below 'UNCUT' reads 'STRAIGHT BOURBON WHISKEY' in uppercase.
Front label lists alcohol as '57% ALC/VOL' and also shows '114 PROOF' near the bottom; value transcribed as printed.
Front label at bottom shows the bottle size as '750ML' (no space).

fieldDetails.reasoning: Back label contains the standard two-part federal health warning beginning with 'GOVERNMENT WARNING:' followed by the two numbered statements.
Back label contains the bottler name and city/state in the statement 'BOTTLED BY BACKBONE BOURBON CO. INDIANAPOLIS, IN' â€” name and address portion extracted.
Back label begins the name/address block with the phrase 'BOTTLED BY'.
The word 'Estate' appears prominently beneath the brand name in a stylized script and serves as a product/fanciful name.
No imported country-of-origin or 'Product of ...' statement is visible on the front or back labels.
Back label contains a small age/maturation line that appears to read 'AGED 48 MONTHS' near the distilled statement; legibility is moderate.
Back label includes the phrase 'Distilled in Indiana' (indicating the state where the spirit was distilled).
No statement about standards of fill is present on the visible front or back labels.
